table_caption: Letter accuracy changes regressed against correlation changes with intercept on previously identified pairs. Type of the ROI pair (L: intra Language Network; I: inter-Language-DMN; D: DMN); estimate, standard error (SE), T-statistic, P-value and 95% confidence interval (CI) of the linear coefficient of correlation change; the R-squared (R sq.) of the linear model are reported. Within networks, ROI pairs are ranked by test statistics in previous test on average treatment effect on inter-regional correlation.
